mecard.customer

Class FlatUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.customer.FlatUser

  • public class FlatUser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a helper class for the customer represented as a flat user. Limitations: searching for a field in the extended sections will return the last found result, ie, if the user has two addresses, searching for STREET will return one or the other, but indeterminitely. This is due to the fact that the fields are stored as EnumMaps.
    See Also:
    EnumMap

      • add

        public void add(FlatUserFieldTypes whichField,

      • add

        public void add(FlatUserExtendedFields extField,
       FlatUserFieldTypes whichField,
       java.lang.String field)
        Adds a field to the extended VED sections of the flat user. Warning: Internally there is no checking to ensure you are placing a valid field in a valid section, that is, you can add a NOTE field to an USER_ADDR1 field even thou that is not legal in Symphony.
        Parameters:
        extField - the enum for the field to add to.
        whichField - the enum of the field you are adding.
        field - String you are adding as a value to the field.

      • getField

        public java.lang.String getField(FlatUserFieldTypes field)
        Method returns the value in a given field. If the field is not set it returns an empty string.
        Parameters:
        field -
        Returns:
        the value of the field or an empty field if none found.

      • toList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> toList()
        Gets the customer as a list of Strings formatted in flat format.
        Returns:
        List of the customer fields.

      • setDefaultProperties

        public void setDefaultProperties()
        Adds all the default properties specified in the default_create_config.xml. Note this method does not enter default fields in extended field sections of Address1, Address2 or XINFO for the flat user.

        public java.lang.String toString()
